name: Community Development Block Grants Section 108 Loan Guarantees
objective: To provide communities with a source of financing for economic development, housing rehabilitation, public facilities, and large scale physical development projects.
top_agency_name: Department of Housing and Urban Development
sub_agency_name: Assistant Secretary for Community Planning and Development
assistance_types: Local (includes State-designated Indian Tribes, excludes institutions of higher education and hospitals

results.description: Thirteen applications were approved in FY 2018, totaling $58.6 million.  Ninety-seven percent (97%) of the amount awarded was budgeted for activities that benefit low- and moderate-income persons.

authorizations.text: 24, 570, Subpart M, Housing and Community Development Act of 1974, as amended.
